title: Refund STILL YET received
content:
I returned pixel and case  Nov/2. After 10 days later, confirming google got my device and case back, no refund for my phone but only got the case Refund in my account. Customer service numbers is NO WHERE TO BE FOUND except for playstore. I need my refund ASAP and I can’t believe this is how google works.
I don’t want to say this but product from China customer service is way better than google!!! Please Try changing your policies over customer service or DONT SELL THE PRODUCT YOU CANT TAKE CARE OFF.
Order # GS.7276-5433-1399
RMA # RMA02427271
